description:
Natsu and Wendy are thrown in jail, while Lucy is taken to be executed! Meanwhile, Happy and Carla find themselves in Extalia, the kingdom of the Exceeds... But to their shock, Extalia is a land filled with cats like them! Heralded as heroes for completing their duty, Happy and Carla are escorted to the Queen, but what exactly was their duty to begin with anyway? The shocking truth is...
Source: crunchyroll
